name: Pig Slaughter
description: Kim Waldron Ltd. produced this animation with images from the Beautiful Creatures project. In order to understand how animals are transformed into the meat that we eat, during a one-month residency at English Harbour Art Centre in Newfoundland the artist Kim Waldron put herself in the shoes of the slaughterer, the butcher and the cook. She produced a series of photographs in the form of a documentary that questions the profound disconnection that we live with in relationship to food. This is the second of a suite of three GIFs.
